message:
I was referring to the "Online" search that you have in the screenshot. If I use the console, here's what I get:

PM> Install-Package Nito.AsyncEx.AsyncDiagnostics  
Install-Package : Unable to find package 'Nito.AsyncEx.AsyncDiagnostics'.  
At line:1 char:1

+ Install-Package Nito.AsyncEx.AsyncDiagnostics

+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 + CategoryInfo : NotSpecified: (:) [Install-Package], InvalidOperationException

 + FullyQualifiedErrorId : NuGetCmdletUnhandledException,NuGet.PowerShell.Commands.InstallPackageCommand

I guess I'll just grab the actual package file and manually install it. Just thought I'd let you know there's an issue with your package.
